name: Île Flottante aux Fraises
description: Light and fluffy floating islands with a vibrant strawberry coulis, perfect for a summer dessert.

components.name: Strawberry Meringues
ingredients: 1/4 tsp Vinegar or Cream of Tartar
instructions: Seperate the eggs, whip the egg whites and start adding half of the sugar slowly into it. Once you get stiff peaks after around 3 minutes of beating, fold in your vanilla, vinegar, and strawberry powder
Add the rest of the sugar into the yolks. Beat it until it pale and yellow.
Bring the cream and milk to a boil and combine the two mixtures.

components.name: Crème Anglaise
instructions: Heat the milk to 183°F (84°C) and slowly pour a small amount of the milk into the mixed egg yolks and sugar, whisking constantly. Add more until you bring the egg mixture up to temperature
Return the mixture back to the pot and stir until it thickens.

components.name: Sugar Caramel Strands
instructions: Set up a way to add stripes of caramel over a rod like surface so the caramel holds the individual strands. Oil the road to make it easier to take the sugar off
Heat the sugar and water until caramelized and take off the heat. Wait for a minute until it thickens slightly
Carefully pour onto a silicone mat and let harden.
